title: Twin Bay Christmas: Finally Family
description: Christmas has come to Twin Bay, bringing with it several feel-good holiday shorts featuring your favorite couples in the series.Nick & Scarlet in Snowy SurpriseThomas & Annalise in Tree TreatNataly & Gavin in Perfect PresentMarianna & Rico in Dinner DelightPlus: Killer's Good DeedAnd: An early peek at Nataly & Gavin's novella, EMBRACED and Katelyn & Anthony's novella, CONSUMED, both coming out 2020!♥This delicious gem is set after the events in HIDDEN, but before the epilogue. ♥
author: T.K. Barber
